name: After being laid off, I got hundreds of millions of systems, and I upgraded them alone
author: Huixing
content: The company was acquired, and the game otaku who was “optimized” was proposed to break up by his girlfriend? Is it a collapse or a broken can? Ye Fei shook his head: No, I don’t want it! The best AI beauties bring hundreds of millions of systems, the more you spend,
